text: Body Heat is the second album by group Blue System, released in 1988. There were 4 single releases from this album: "My Bed Is Too Big" was released in April 1988, "Under My Skin" in October 1988, "Silent Water" in December 1988 and "Love Suite" (Remix '89) in April 1989. ==Track listing== # "Under My Skin" – 3:31 # "Do You Wanna Be My Girlfriend" – 3:55 # "Titanic 650604" – 3:23 # "Love Suite" – 3:17 # "Body Heat" – 3:04 # "My Bed Is Too Big" – 3:13 # "Too Young" – 3:39 # "Sorry Little Sarah" (New York Dance Mix) – 5:56 # "Silent Water" – 3:34 # "I Want to Be Your Brother" – 3:12 ==Personnel== * Dieter Bohlen – lead vocals, chorus, producer, arranger, lyrics * Rolf Köhler – refrain vocals, chorus * Detlef Wiedeke – chorus * Michael Scholz – chorus * Luis Rodrigues – co-producer ==External links== * Category:Blue System albums Category:1988 albums Category:Hansa Records albums
title: Body Heat (Blue System album)
